title: HARD Eligibility Tracker
text:
Practice hours






Let’s combine the two columns off_skates and in_attendance to obtain a complete list of all players present for a practice type (p_type OR p_type2).







Problem 1: Dates
As shown in the error field above, some of the dates are incorrect.


Problem 2: Names
Inconsistency in player names can lead to underestimation of hours. Let’s check the different names in the player field.


 [1] "allbuckedup"         "atomic"              "bats hit crazy"

title: Blocker Statistics
text:
Blocker statistics over the course of the game







Definitions




n_jams: number of jams in which a blocker/pivot was involved in, either on track or in the box.
n_points_against_per_jam: number of points scored against a player per jam. Smaller numbers are better.

n_points_against_per_jam = number of points scored in all jams that a blocker/pivot is involved in (either on track or in the box) divided by n_jams

prop_box_per_jam: proportion of jams in which a blocker/pivot sat in the box. Smaller numbers are better.
prop_jams_smallwall: proportion of jams in which a blocker/pivot was part of a smaller wall (less than 4). Smaller numbers are better.







# Showing statists for Game 1 #

Team 1: HighAltitudeRollerDerby 
Team 2: MontereyBayRollerDerby

title: Statistics for Roller Derby
text:
This website contain statistics for a roller derby game, obtained from the WFTDA Statsbook.
For questions, please contact us via email.

title: Jammer Statistics
text:
Jammer statistics over the course of the game






Definitions




n_jams: number of jams started by a jammer, either on track or in the box.
n_points_per_jam: number of points scored by the player per jam. Bigger numbers are better.
prop_leads: proportion of jams in which the jammer obtained lead. Bigger numbers are better.





# Showing statists for Game 1 #

Team 2: MontereyBayRollerDerby
